abstract: The group of governors and heads of supervision who oversee the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision said that they had reached a “broad agreement” on the “overall design” of new capital and liquidity rules for banks.
snippet: The group of governors and heads of supervision who oversee the Basel Committee on Banking Supervision said that they had reached a “broad agreement” on the “overall design” of new capital and liquidity rules for banks.
lead_paragraph: 8:55 p.m. | Updated The New York Times’s Eric Dash and Nelson D. Schwartz provide more details of the agreement in Basel.

headline.main: Basel Group Reaches Accord on Bank Capital Rules
